title: Cozy spacious apartment with a view, by UCSF, Golden Gate Park
posting_body: Live in a great location and pay low rent!

A spacious one bedroom and one bathroom apartment on the top floor with a view, includes a kitchenette, a sizable living room, a large bedroom closet, and a large bedroom, bathroom, and kitchen, with laundry facilities on site.
Located at Kirkham St and 16th Ave.
The apartment is also walking distance to food delivery services, restaurants, take-out, and fast food places.
Nearby are the MUNI bus stop #6 and the underground MUNI N light rail which can bring you downtown in approximately 15-20 minutes.
To schedule a tour, please contact/text Josephine:  415-2O5-7347
